channel.title: Sample tune advice
channel.description:
I’ve been tasked with creating a Minecraft-inspired tune for a potential video game score prospect. Any Minecrafters here to tell me if it has a similar vibe?
https://app.auxy.co/projects/nsD5sF8-P9jf1xW8Y_my9A==

item.title: Sample tune advice
item.dc:creator: Crescendo2020
item.description:
Yeah, I think it was off as well. I didn’t get the gig, so it appears the dev agreed. Heheh I appreciate the feedback.

Read full topic

item.title: Sample tune advice
item.dc:creator: L1me
item.description:
Eh. I think that it’s to soft. Most Minecraft songs that play (I play on Java) have a simple melody that are clear and usually don’t have lots of space and reverb. I think that it’s good but it needs to be more simplistic. Just make the melody a light pluck with no reverb or delay or space. Then add very simple drums. The Minecraft music is very simple so make urs simple.

Read full topic
